snippet: A hearing on the issue comes a few months after a crash at an air show in Nevada that killed 10 spectators and a pilot.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board holds hearing on safety of air shows, in wake of air show crash in Nevada that killed 10 spectators and a pilot; performance aviation experts say industry is safe and not in need of further regulation.
lead_paragraph: A hearing on the issue comes a few months after a crash at an air show in Nevada that killed 10 spectators and a pilot.

headline.seo: Air Shows Need No New Rules, Transport Safety Board Is Told
headline.main: Air Shows Are Safe Enough, Transport Safety Panel Is Told
headline.print_headline: Air Shows Are Safe Enough, Transport Safety Panel Is Told
